page.title: 01Summary of area as a whole.
page.content: The block is to the east and north of Pencombe village.It consists of approximately half the village, including the church,school,village hall,post office and Pencombe Hall. There are modern and old buildings in our portion of the village,also some houses are under construction. The area consists mainly of farmland;animals and crops.Most of_ the land is grassland, being used for animal grazing.The fields are separated by hedgerows generally. There is only a small area of deciduous woodland. Because agriculture is the main activity of the block,employment is generally linked to this, in a majority of cases. Bromyard is the nearest main town. It is four miles from Pencombe.
